website_summaries.verdict: Since this formula includes a host of ingredients to promote flexibility and joint health and 90 tablets per bag, it’s an excellent health boost for your cat, and a great value for your wallet.
pros: Features joint health ingredients such as glucosamine, vitamin E, and omega-3 fatty acids
cons: Although this is a great formula, cats with shrimp or crab allergies should avoid it

customer_reviews.title: Great results, but doesn’t physically hold up in the heat during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results! Our old dog’s arthritic knees had her crippled up so bad she couldn’t run. Now, after three months of Flexadin, she still limps a little, but she can run again. Highly recommend. UPDATE: I ordered another pack of this product when I began to run low on the first...it arrived congealed together inside its pack! Maybe the heat in shipping? I don’t know, but once it was in the air-conditioned house and cooled down, I still had to pry each dose apart from the semi-melted mass. The stuff works great, but the texture was that of softened tar when it arrived (August 2018).
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Only one drawback
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving these to my dogs for a long time since I had a senior dog with severe arthritis. At that time my vet recommended it. I have 3 small dogs that are all seniors and 2 have arthritis. They only take one half of a chewable and have always taken them well. The only problem is that before the bag is finished, the chewable start getting hard. My dogs still take them but not as heartily when they get hard. I do think they help a lot though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have given these to my dog for a couple of years now and he loves them. I n my last order, the chews were all mangled almost beyond recognition. I have to figure out about how many fragments make up a dose. For that much money the chews should at least be intact. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Swan

customer_reviews.title: good supplement - I think
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old Great Pyrenees to help prevent possible future joint problems. He will sometimes refuse to take it as a treat, but will eventually. This is the 3rd package I've purchased. One was from my vet and was for small dogs (odd that she sold me that one) and the other two have been for large breeds. He definitely is a large breed dog. I'll be repeat buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McCafferty

customer_reviews.title: Working so far
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my dogs love these and the other one won’t touch them. As for the flavor , well being that I am obviously not a DOG, I really can’t say 😂 My Shih Tzu’s are all getting older and the 2 that will eat them seem a little more agile since they started taking them, so that’s a plus !!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Price is  up
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for several years. About 9 years. It is a good product. My vet had us to give this to one of our dogs. Didn't take me long to find that Amazon was cheaper than the vet. Now it seems like the product price is sneaking up over time. I might eventually have to rethink this product to something similar.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hix

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good shipping
customer_reviews.text: I always order these from this company and they always arrive whole, not a bunch of crumbs or melted together like some others. I had my old dog on other kinds of glucosamine supplements and tried these on the recommendation of my vet. I did notice a difference in my dog's mobility, so she's been on them for years now and I do believe they help.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie E.

customer_reviews.title: Should be malleable
customer_reviews.text: These chews should be soft. For some reason they have been arriving hard and not malleable at all, this is from several different vendors. While the ingredients and percentage of active ingredients are higher than most brands, they must have a packaging issue - one that didn’t exist in past years (my dog has been on this for years). I still continue to purchase, just wish they would fix the issue so the treats are soft again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t appraise high enough for this product. One of my dogs couldn’t walk up and down stairs and was generally unfit due to lack of mobility. Within a week of starting these supplements, it’s like I have a different dog! He runs and plays and is like a puppy again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KAinLA

customer_reviews.title: 11 Years Old & Still Hiking!
customer_reviews.text: When we rescued our Cindi (Texas Blue Lacy Mix) our vet recommended we start her on this product. Originally I purchased from my vet, later found I could conveniently order it from Amazon for a cheaper price. She is 11 years old and still fit for hiking. I think this product has helped her and we continue to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Taste approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving these to my Golden for about 1.5 years. I notice a difference when she hasn't been taking it (they don't give it to her when she stays in the boarding facility during vacation). She loves the taste and thinks it's a treat. I used to buy the tablet version from the same company but she much prefers the chews. This is a great sized bag although the chews tend to get a bit smushed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My Toy Australian Shepard had developed a limp. The vet stated after the x-ray she had a bone spur in her shoulder. The vet suggested this product. Now she is running after her ball, and chasing bunnies out of the yard all day.
customer_reviews.author: BJan

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have an older lab with arthritis and this product makes a world of difference in his ability to move. He acts younger and it isn’t so hard for him to get up or do stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: I would order again it seems to help my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I would order again it seems to help my dog but. It came broken up in small pieces and at least half of product was a guessing game as to how much I was giving.. When they change their packaging I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: osito1

customer_reviews.title: Flexadin Chews
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by our Vet for our Yorkie. Small dogs can have an issue with joint development over their life span. The product has some of the same ingredients that humans take for joint health. Our 9 pound Yorkie takes half a chew each day, so one package will last around six months. She seems to like the taste and we basically give it to her as a treat. Will it work, only time will tell, but it is worth the expense for preventive health care.
customer_reviews.author: P.Badger

customer_reviews.title: Picky Pet Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived timely. The chews were pliable. My Shih Tzu ate the half chew as prescribed for her size. Since she is picky about food, apparently, the flavor works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a degenerative joint disease in her elbow, this product was recommended by our veterinarian. My dog loves it and it has really seemed to ease her pain and give her more pep in her step! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: DRY AS A BONE!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived as schedule, however, the product inside was as dry as a bone. There was no way that I could give my cat 1/2 of the chewy because I could not break it into halves and he couldn't chew it. I'm throwing it away and getting it from my vet. I couldn't find an expiration date on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Joint health for your pets
customer_reviews.text: We have an older pup. Our vet recommended this as one of the options to keep his joints healthy. He likes the taste (others he wouldn't touch!). So it is easy to administer. Long term we'll see how much good it does. This is more for prevention than treatment.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: An impressive nutritional supplement for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my Vet and I can Buy it on Amazon at a better price! This is highly nutritious and certainly helps in their overall health. Its highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Arkansan

customer_reviews.title: Not for cats
customer_reviews.text: Packaging this product as being able to use for cats is ridiculous. The size alone is outrageous. Even when cutting 1/3 of the chew into little pieces it still gives the cat diarrhea. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: cheryl gambino

customer_reviews.title: Dry product
customer_reviews.text: The product was stuck together in the bag. Had to break them apart. Product seemed old. I didn't finish the bag because of that. Didn't want my dogs to get sick.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: okay product
customer_reviews.text: My cat vomited twice after taking Flexadin. I stopped giving it and will try again after a few days. Amazon delivered it on the driveway, didn't ring the bell and we had a storm, so it got soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.R.

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy joint supplement tablets, for my 11 year old Collie, at the Vet Clinic but, they switched brands to these and jacked the price up to $75 a bag. I tried them and, not only does she love them, she is not having trouble going up and down the stairs anymore. She also takes off like a rocket when she sees a squirrel. She can't catch them but, she likes to try. After searching on Amazon, I found the exact same thing for just over half the price. SOLD!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My baby feels better
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my 13 year old lab. She has arthritis in some of her joints and this product helps her get around and move a lot easier. A year ago she hated going for walks and now she's chasing squirrels again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: quality and performance were as expected, would buy again, would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: She is now eating better and playful
customer_reviews.text: I think it is helping with my dogs' arthritis pain. She is now eating better and playful again
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O

customer_reviews.title: Subscription item
customer_reviews.text: I have this on auto reorder - it arrives on time & in good condition everytime
customer_reviews.author: Holly S

customer_reviews.title: My kitten mcnugget loves ‘em
customer_reviews.text: My cat surprisingly loves them! Have to cut them in half for cats, though.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: It is worth every penny and it works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! The product has helped immensely with her hip problem., she longer “hitches” when she walks or runs.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ginewsky

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: A good product it does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it...helping with joints
customer_reviews.text: My dog takes one daily. Eats it like a treat! Seems to be helping with joint problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Henry

customer_reviews.title: Exspensive cheapest on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Cut loves them. Have to break in ting pieces soft but thick
customer_reviews.author: pic 3

customer_reviews.title: Not a smaller version of the larger chews
customer_reviews.text: My little guys love the larger Flexadin, so I thought this would be appropriate for them. Unfortunately, it is a different formulation, and is sweeter than the larger chews, and the little dogs hate it. They clean their plates every morning, with the exception of this chew.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Hen

customer_reviews.title: Like the fountain of youth for my ailing senior dog!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old dog who is all of 10 pounds was having problems with his back for several years. He would freeze up in pain and probably back spasms. The problem was becoming more frequent, and it would just break my heart to see him this way. I started giving him Flexadin Plus about 6 months ago and he has not had an episode since!!! Prior to starting this supplement, my dog's hair had grown very thin. The Vet led me to believe these symptoms were just a part of aging. Flexadin Plus has restored my dog's health and vitality. It as though has found the fountain of youth. I wish there was something like this for humans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement in our elderly dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 year old dog was slowing down, walking with obvious pain. She loves these as if they were treats and walks and runs without problem
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Promoted joint health in your aging pet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent and easy way to make sure that your dog gets Glucosamine in their daily diet.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Best price I’ve found on amazon with quick shipping. My dog has been taking it for quite a while. Seems to help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Supplement I have used
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old Havanese acts like a puppy again. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Donald J

customer_reviews.title: We do what we can for our pets.
customer_reviews.text: Vetoquinol seemed to help our dog's joints. It's not a cure but we noticed an improvement in activity. I thank for an older dog it can't hurt anything and may help.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harmon

customer_reviews.title: This products works and differences in my dog were seen ...
customer_reviews.text: This products works and differences in my dog were seen in a month. I am never without this product for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste & texture. And too large even when broken in half.
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie hates the taste & texture. Too gummy & hard for him to chew. I have to break up a half in tiny pieces & hide in a pill pocket treat for him to get it down. It’s for his arthritis. Not sure yet if it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Joint supplements
customer_reviews.text: One dog likes them, the other doesn’t, flavor or picky eater? They were delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat didn't like them
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get my cat to eat these even though I carefully cut them up to look like cat treats. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: The pooch has a bad knee and the vet recommended these, they seem to work well as the vet has since said the dog's knee feels properly lubricated and we have had less issues with his flux patella. The dog also loves eating them which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Amos

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in it
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to report that when I opened it up I found that all the chews were hard as rocks and feel that the product sent had expired. Very disappointed in it. I feel for the price I paid they should have been fresh. I am now going to try to send them back or least be credited for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy order and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, has really helped our 9 ye are old with his joint issues. Ordering and delivery from Amazon was awesome, wasn’t expecting for another week when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: It does seem to reduce arthritic pain.
customer_reviews.text: This product does seem help our old arthritic dog to have less pain and be a little more active.
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: Jumping, cutting sharp corners like the good old days
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Our older dog, 13 now, was having issues with joint soreness. About a month after starring him on these, half-dose a day as he is 50lbs, he had a very noticeable spring in his step. Jumping, cutting sharp corners like the good old days.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Grainy, unusual consistency
customer_reviews.text: These chews were grainy and had an unusual consistency, like they were old or had been stored for a very long time. Definitely not like the ones I bought at the vets office.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else worked and so worth the $
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a very hard time walking and jumping up on the couch. Has RA and takes dog IBUPROFEN. With this product, she’s is mobile now and can jump on the couch again likes she did when she was a pup.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia DeMauro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My Vet recommend my dog to go on these because had surgery on his Acl. He has been on these for 3 yrs and is 8 yrs old and running strong .
customer_reviews.author: angie s woelke

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: I wish this stuff worked for humans as well as it does for little black dogs
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: We definitely know this helps her and recommend it for other dogs with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Helps my 14 year old tremendously. My Jack Russell has arthritis in her back legs and this med helps her with mobility. We definitely know this helps her and recommend it for other dogs with arthritis.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs and cats seem to like the flavor. Sometimes, maybe because of flat packaging, many of the chews are broken. Better pricing than locally.

customer_reviews.title: good value

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...repeat customer who is very happy with this product and the results it has shown with my 12 year old standard poodles!

customer_reviews.title: my dog doesn't seem to like the plus
customer_reviews.text: my dog doesn't seem to like the plus, not sure what the difference is as his vet had sold me the regular flexadin before and he tolerated mixed with his wet/dry dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... been pet sitting an elderly shepherd who was 3-legged lame for the first 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Have been pet sitting an elderly shepherd who was 3-legged lame for the first 2 years, started her on the Flexadin and within 2 months she was using all 4 legs and running completely pain and lameness free!

customer_reviews.title: and they LOVE it think it's a treat

customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised but arrived with chews molded together in hunks of 3 or more or pieces instead of the quantity listed as individual chews. It was like they were over vacuum sealed and then in the heat. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 14 years old & has had worsening hip problems for the last couple of years. She loves this chew & seemed to have benefit fairly quickly from it - she started to move better & her appetite increased so she's stopped losing weight. She's been on this for almost a month now & seems to be doing better & better. She runs a little more now & doesn't have as much trouble jumping into the car. It's great to see her move & act more like she did when she was younger. This is well worth the cost. I'm really glad that my vet recommended it.

product_meta.title: Vetoquinol Flexadin Plus Hip & Joint Chews
feature_bullets: Comprehensive formula with Glucosamine + MSM supports joint health and flexibility in dogs and cats
Contains Chondroitin, Omega-3s and Vitamin E, important components of healthy joints and cartilage
Easy-to-administer supplement chews that can be given whole or at meal time
Supports joint integrity and may soothe your pet’s joint discomfort in hips, knees and other areas
